pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karontā antaraghare nisīdanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk14:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karonto antaraghare nisīdati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
